response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $10,000 to me. Considering its immense worth to both myself and potential buyers like you, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire such a valuable item at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 9500}
